comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of acai berry smoothies made
- y: number of banana chocolate smoothies made

Extracted Constraints:
- Acai Berry Units: 7x \leq 3500
- Banana Chocolate Units: 6y \leq 3200
- Minimum Acai Berry Percentage: x \geq 0.35(x+y)
- Banana Chocolate Must Be More: y \geq x

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize the total amount of water used: 3x + 4y
